tuv.seg: Re-use of Public Sector Information
Faisnéis Earnála Poiblí a Athúsáid

The Citizens Information Board complies with the regulations on the Re-use of Public Sector Information (European Communities (Re-use of Public Sector Information) Regulations 2005 (as amended)) and we encourage the re-use of the information that we produce

Comhlíonann an Bord um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh na rialacháin maidir le Faisnéis na hEarnála Poiblí a Athúsáid (Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Faisnéis na hEarnála Poiblí a Athúsáid), 2005 (arna leasú)) agus spreagaimid an fhaisnéis a tháirgimid a athúsáid
The regulations are available at www.psi.gov.ie
Tá na rialacháin ar fáil ag www.psi.gov.ie

Information and documents obtained from www.citizensinformation.ie may be reproduced and/or re-used free of charge subject to the latest PSI licence, Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)

Féadtar faisnéis agus cáipéisí a fhaightear ó www.citizensinformation.ie a atáirgeadh agus/nó a athúsáid saor in aisce faoi réir an cheadúnais FEP is déanaí, Creative Commons Attribution International (CC BY )
Information on the licence is available at www.psi.gov.ie
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis faoin gceadúnas ag www.psi.gov.ie
Under the CC-BY licence, the source of the information must be acknowledged
Faoin gceadúnas CC-BY, caithfear foinse na faisnéise a aithint

Where a specific attribution statement is not provided the following attribution statement can be used: “Contains Irish Public Sector Data licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence”

Sa chás nach soláthraítear ráiteas sonrach aitreabúideachta, féadtar an ráiteas aitreabúideachta a leanas a úsáid: “Cuimsítear ann seo Sonraí faoi Earnáil Phoiblí na hÉireann a cheadúnaítear faoi cheadúnas Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)”
Please also read the disclaimer regarding information available on this website
Leigh, le do thoil, an séanadh maidir le faisnéis ar fáil ar an láithreán seo
For enquiries on the re-use of information maintained by the Citizens Information Board please email psi@ciboard.ie
Chun ceist a chur faoi athúsáid faisnéise cothabháilte ag an mBord um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh seol r-phost, le do thoil, chuig psi@ciboard.ie
Permission to reproduce information from citizensinformation.ie does not extend to any material on this site which may be the property of a third party
Ní leathnaíonn cead maidir le faisnéis ó citizensinformation.ie a athfhoilsiú go dtí aon ábhar ar an láithreán seo a d'fhéadfadh a bheith i seilbh tríu páirtí
Authorisation to reproduce such material must be obtained from the copyright holders concerned
Caithfear údarú chun ábhar mar seo a athfhoilsiú a fháil ó shealbhóirí an chóipchirt
